text:
查看優惠券或輸入序號
回饋 2星會員 遠傳幣 0.5%
小計
$32,300
我已詳讀 遠傳行動寬頻服務契約、網路申購合約條款 (請點擊查看)並同意契約內容
遠傳網路門市擁有接受訂單與否的權利，且同意辦理退貨時，由遠傳電信代為處理發票及銷貨退回證明單，以加速退貨退款作業。
我已知悉可以至遠傳電信直營門市申請「無線上網免費體驗專案」之服務。
我同意收到遠傳提供之權益通知。

Subtotal

I have read the FarEasTone Mobile Broadband Service Agreement and the Online Purchase Agreement Terms (Click to View) and agree to the terms of the contract.
FarEasTone retail stores have the right to accept or reject orders, and agree to handle returns through FarEasTone Telecom, who will process the invoices and sales return certificates to expedite the return and refund process.
I acknowledge that I can apply for the "Free Wireless Internet Experience Program" service at any FarEasTone Telecom direct store.
I agree to receive notifications about the benefits provided by FarEasTone.
